languages.text: "Старик, он был не жилец. Мутировал на глазах. Просто приблизил свой конец".
"Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."
languages.original_text: "Старик, он был не жилец. Мутировал на глазах. Просто приблизил свой конец".

traits.locale_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “老家伙，他早就必死无疑了。他刚刚就在我们面前发生了变异，你仅仅是提前结束了他的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."

traits.locale_text: “老家伙，他早就必死无疑了。他刚刚就在我们面前发生了变异，你仅仅是提前结束了他的痛苦。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Il s'en serait jamais tiré, vieillard. Il était en train de muter juste sous notre nez. Vous n'avez fait que mettre un terme à sa souffrance. »
languages.original_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'en serait jamais tiré, vieillard. Il était en train de muter juste sous notre nez. Vous n'avez fait que mettre un terme à sa souffrance. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Anciano, jamás habría sobrevivido. Estaba mutando delante de usted. Solo ha puesto un fin rápido a su sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."

traits.locale_text: «Anciano, jamás habría sobrevivido. Estaba mutando delante de usted. Solo ha puesto un fin rápido a su sufrimiento».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「彼はもう助からないわ。目の前で突然変異を起こしたんだもの。あなたは彼の苦しみを早く終わらせただけ」
languages.original_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."

traits.locale_text: 「彼はもう助からないわ。目の前で突然変異を起こしたんだもの。あなたは彼の苦しみを早く終わらせただけ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Alter Mann, er hätte ohnehin nie überlebt. Er ist vor unseren Augen mutiert. Ihr habt seinem Leid nur ein früheres Ende bereitet."
languages.original_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."

traits.locale_text: "Alter Mann, er hätte ohnehin nie überlebt. Er ist vor unseren Augen mutiert. Ihr habt seinem Leid nur ein früheres Ende bereitet."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."

languages.text: "Kurtulması imkânsızdı ihtiyar. Gözümüzün önünde mutasyona uğruyordu. Daha fazla acı çekmesine mâni oldun."
languages.original_text: "Old man, he was never going to make it. He was mutating right in front of us. You just ended his suffering sooner."

traits.locale_text: "Kurtulması imkânsızdı ihtiyar. Gözümüzün önünde mutasyona uğruyordu. Daha fazla acı çekmesine mâni oldun."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
